document.forum_title: National security expert: Trump saying Obama is the ‘founder of ISIS’ is ‘just plain nuts’ [Video]
document.topic_text: The deep-fried Twinkie is jumping from the country fair to a nearby oven. Hostess is launching a version that marks its first foray into frozen foods. (Aug. 12)
